        protected String checkString(String text)
                      throws UnexpectedLiquibaseException
        Catch any characters that will cause problems when parsing the XML down the road.
        Throws:
        UnexpectedLiquibaseException - with the message INVALID_STRING_ENCODING_MESSAGE if an issue is found.
